sections: do you like more? Whether you answered the
doesn’t matter if you win this new Corvette Dream Giveaway. With a charitable donation of just $3.00 you can enter to win a custom restomod
. Even better, you won’t even be on the hook for the taxes because Dream Giveaway is throwing in $43,000 to cover those too.
Under the hood of the custom restomod

convertible is a 376ci LS3 V8 engine mated to a 6-speed manual transmission. A fully independent suspension underpinning ensures a modern ride and a french stitched leather interior provides a luxurious comfort. Painted a beautiful silver over red, this Corvette was masterfully restored with SEMA quality. Money was no object during the process and the cost exceeded $250,000. Besides the style, this car is almost as modern feeling as the brand new
Thanks to the mid-engine design, the

is the fastest, most powerful base-level Corvette that Chevrolet has ever built. However, the one being given away by Dream Giveaway is not a base model. It features nearly all of the high-priced add-ons offered by Chevrolet, including the Z51 performance and suspension packages and the 3LT premium equipment package.

This is a fantastic opportunity to fill your garage with a matching pair of Corvettes from two of the most iconic generations and all you have to do is donate to a great charity. As a way of saying thanks for being a reader, we would like to help you win by doubling your entries when you donate more than $25. So, head on over to
, make a donation of at least $25, and use the auto populated promo code
